amendment.description: To ensure the integrity of the Earned Income Tax Credit program by reducing the potential for fraud and to ensure that aliens who receive an adjustment of this status under this bill meet their obligation to pay back taxes without creating a burden on the American public.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4136 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 155.

action.text: Amendment SA 4136 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S5160-5163, S5189; text: CR S5160) To ensure the integrity of the Earned Income Tax Credit program by reducing the potential for fraud and to ensure that aliens who receive an adjustment of this status under this bill meet their obligation to pay back taxes without creating a burden on the American public.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4136 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 155.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4136 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 155.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4136 proposed by Senator Ensign.
